title: Login with valid credentials
description: Verify that login succeeds and authentication state updates with correct user ID and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen.
Input valid user ID and password.
Click the login button.
Check that user is authenticated and navigated to home screen.

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Ensure login fails with incorrect user ID and/or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to login screen.
Enter invalid user ID or password.
Click the login button.
Verify error message is displayed and user remains on login screen.

title: Session persistence after app restart
description: Verify that after a successful login, user session persists when the app is closed and reopened.

steps.description: Login successfully with valid credentials.
Close and restart the application.
Check that the user remains logged in and is navigated to the home screen.

title: Logout functionality and protected zones access
description: Ensure logging out returns the user to the login screen and accessing protected sections prompts for login.

steps.description: Login successfully.
Navigate to logout button and perform logout.
Verify user is redirected to login screen and authentication state is cleared.
Attempt to access protected user profile or download sections while logged out.
Check that login prompt appears to restrict access.

title: Home screen layout responsiveness and scrolling
description: Validate that the home screen displays categorized movie grids properly with smooth vertical scrolling and adaptive layout.

steps.description: Navigate to home screen.
Verify sections 'New Releases', 'Popular Now', and 'Top 10' are visible with proper spacing.
Scroll vertically through the home screen content.
Check scrolling is smooth without jitter or layout shifts.

title: Category chips horizontal scroll with visual feedback
description: Verify horizontal scrollable category chips provide visual cues on selection and scroll smoothly.

steps.description: Navigate to home screen category chips.
Scroll horizontally across category chips.
Verify scrolling is smooth without jank.
Select a category chip.
Confirm visual highlight or selection cue appears on the selected chip.

title: Movie poster image loading, caching, and fallback
description: Ensure movie poster images load efficiently with caching and display fallback placeholder if loading fails.

steps.description: Navigate to home screen with movie posters displayed.
Verify images load quickly and cache on repeat visits.
Simulate image load failure by blocking image resource.
Check that fallback placeholder image is shown instead of broken image.

title: Real-time search filtering with empty state handling
description: Validate that search input filters movie content dynamically with keyboard support and shows 'No Results' screen if no matches.

steps.description: Focus on search input and type a query.
Confirm search results update in real-time matching the query.
Type a query that matches no movie.
Check that a clear 'No Results' screen or message is displayed.

title: Filter tags update search input and results correctly
description: Ensure that selecting and deselecting tag and category filters updates the search input and filtered movie list accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to search/filter section.
Select one or more tag/category filters.
Verify that the search input updates accordingly and filtered results match selected filters.
Deselect filters.
Confirm search input and results revert appropriately.

title: Protected profile and downloads access control
description: Verify that unauthenticated users attempting to access profile or downloads are prompted to login, and authenticated users see correct data.

steps.description: While logged out, attempt to access user profile section.
Check login prompt is shown.
Login successfully.
Navigate to profile and downloads.
Verify user data is displayed accurately.

title: Accessibility toggles effect and screen reader support
description: Validate toggling audio description and closed captions applies immediately and app supports screen readers with semantic labeling and logical focus.

steps.description: Open settings and toggle audio description.
Confirm that audio description state changes immediately in UI.
Toggle closed captions on and off.
Verify subtitles appear/disappear accordingly.
Enable screen reader (TalkBack/VoiceOver).
Confirm UI elements have semantic labels and logical tab/focus order.

title: Settings persistence for network and display preferences
description: Ensure changes to network usage and brightness settings are saved persistently and applied on app restart.

steps.description: Open settings and adjust network usage preferences.
Adjust brightness slider.
Verify settings changes take immediate effect.
Close and reopen the app.
Confirm that settings persist and reflect user choices.

title: Dark mode UI colors and text readability
description: Verify that dark theme colors provide sufficient contrast and all text elements remain readable without overflow.

steps.description: Enable dark mode theme in settings.
Check color contrast ratios meet accessibility standards.
Verify text does not overflow or get clipped in common screens.

title: Offline mode and API timeout error handling
description: Ensure the app detects offline status or API timeouts and shows appropriate error messages and fallback UI.

steps.description: Disable network connection or simulate API timeout.
Navigate through the app to load content requiring network.
Verify offline error screen or messages display clearly.
Attempt app usage in offline mode.
Check graceful degradation and fallback behaviors.

title: Bottom tab navigation state retention and exit confirmation
description: Validate that navigation across bottom tabs retains state per tab, and back button triggers exit confirmation modal.

steps.description: Navigate across different bottom tabs.
Check each tab retains its state and scroll position.
Press back button on main screen.
Verify exit confirmation modal appears.
